title: The Desecrated Heart
goal: They reach the Blight's epicenter, an ancient, desecrated site, and face its powerful manifestations.

beats.summary: The party arrives at the Blight's source, an ancient, sacred site now twisted into a monstrous nexus of corruption.
They are confronted by powerful, intelligent manifestations of the Blight, acting as guardians of its core.
The environment itself is hostile, constantly shifting and attacking them, reflecting the Blight's immense power.
